text: Manoel Odir Rocha (12 February 1941 â€“ 4 May 2022) was a Brazilian politician. He was a member of the Reform Progressive Party. He was mayor of Palmas from 1997 to 2000 and briefly was in the Chamber of Deputies from February to March 1995. He was born in Araguari, Brazil. Rocha died in Palmas on 4 May 2022 at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Brazilian politicians Category:Tocantins (state)
title: Odir Rocha
